at.htl.smartbot

Class UltrasonicSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htl.smartbot.UltrasonicSource

  • public class UltrasonicSource
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a ultrasonic source hardware and stores its position, distance and the time of the last update
    Author:
    Jakob Ecker, Dominik Simon

        public void updateDistance(double duration)
